snippet: Mitt Romney sought to change the topic in the presidential campaign on Monday with a Web video accusing President Obama of caring more about his donors and friends than the middle class.
abstract: Mitt Romney sought to change the topic in the presidential campaign on Monday with a Web video accusing President Obama of caring more about his donors and friends than the middle class.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and TRIP GABRIEL

headline.main: New Romney Video Features Singing Obama
